participant_1.background:
I need to move more, and get my beer gut under control.
i am a huge fan of jason mraz.
I had a client cancel her wedding a week before the big day.
I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me!
I'm not happy with my job or marriage, but I'm trying to make the best of it.

participant_2.background:
I dropped the dogs off at the kennel before heading to my parents' house.
I play the guitar while I wear comfortable clothes and write my stories.
unfortunately , my family lives across the country from me.
i am in a very intimate and loving relationship.
i need a wheel chair to get around.

content.text: Hey there! I'm doing alright, just dropped my dogs off at the kennel before heading to my parents' house.  How are you doing today?
Not so great, actually. My client canceled her wedding a week before the big day. It really threw me for a loop.
Wow, that's really tough. I'm so sorry to hear that.
Thanks. It's not the first time this has happened either. I guess I need to learn to move on more quickly.
I know it's hard, but you'll get through it. Just keep your head up and keep moving forward.
It sounds like you have a lot of things going for you. You love your job, you're in a great relationship, and you have a passion for music.
Thanks. I appreciate that. It's just hard to focus on the good things when I'm feeling down.
I know, but it's important to try to stay positive. Just remember that things will get better.
I hope so. Thanks for listening.
